triples.name: Belief
triples.relevance: The paper explores belief as a fundamental epistemological concept representing a tripartite propositional attitude.

triples.name: Credence (statistics)
triples.relevance: Credence is examined as a fine-grained attitude representing subjective probability or confidence level toward propositions.

triples.name: Subjective probability
triples.relevance: The paper uses subjective probability as the theoretical foundation for understanding credence as a measure of belief strength.

triples.name: Epistemology
